amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for the Department of Transportation's International Highway Technology Scanning Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds for the International Highway Technology Scanning Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Posey amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Posey amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. Posey.
